Justin Theroux and Aubrey Plaza: Intriguing New Couple Alert? | Wireler

According to a brand new tabloid report, Jennifer Aniston is married to Brad Pitt.

We’re not kidding.

There’s truly a canopy story on the market that claims Aniston and Pitt not too long ago obtained remarried.

But for those who’re apprehensive over how Justin Theroux could also be reacting to this (hilarious) information, fret not, involved readers.

It sounds as if The Leftovers star might have discovered could be very personal rebound romance.

According to People Magazine, Theroux was noticed in New York City this week with Aubrey Plaza, an actress reverse whom he appeared on 4 episodes of Parks and Recreation again in 2010.

Theroux, for many who might have forgotten, guest-starred on this legendary NBC sitcom as Justin Anderson, the love curiosity of Amy Poehler’s Leslie Knope.

Plaza, in the meantime, appeared in all seven seasons of the beloved sequence as downtrodden workplace assistant April Ludgate.

So the 2 have a previous collectively.

Might in addition they have a future collectively?

Yes, an insider tells People.

But perhaps not personally

“They met to discuss a potential film project,” the publication writes, failing to elaborate a lot additional on the interplay.

It would not sound like this can be a new love connection, sadly.

Could we see Theroux make one with anybody sooner or later within the close to future?

If Aniston is absolutely transferring on with Pitt, ought to we anticipate Theroux to hunt his personal revenge romance with somebody in Hollywood or maybe exterior of the scene altogether?

Not actually, a supply explains to People.

“He’s just doing his thing,” this person says of Theroux. “He eats at the same time, goes to the same places, hangs with the same people.”

Indeed, Theroux being a creature of behavior is allegedly one of many the reason why his marriage did not work out.

A handful of stories again when he break up from Aniston claimed that Theroux did not wish to go away New York.

He was supposedly snug with town he knew effectively and made little effort to vary his methods.

Did this stubbornness actually contribute to his divorce from Aniston? We might by no means know.

All we are able to say for sure is that the celebrities introduced on February 15 that that they had determined to go their separate methods after two and a half years of marriage and seven years as a pair.

They did so through the next assertion:

In an effort to cut back any additional hypothesis, we have now determined to announce our separation.

This determination was mutual and lovingly made on the finish of final 12 months.

We are two greatest mates who’ve determined to half methods as a pair, however look ahead to persevering with our cherished friendship.
